name: Tiny Tree (Team Horsehead)
description:
Tiny Tree is a Sim Tower-style game where you take care of a grand tree. Your goal is to grow the tree as tall as possible, keep the roots healthy, and take care of its inhabitants, a rabbit,  deer, and bear.
You will also have to manage resources and build furniture to complete quests and make the residents thrive.

To play Tiny Tree, you use the mouse to click on the buttons and the ESC key to exit.

"Overall, Tiny Tree offers a fun and challenging experience for players who love Sim Tower-style games and want to take care of their own virtual treehouse." 
-ChatGPT
